name: RPG (MarcusFromOz)
description:
This game has been created by completing the following GameDev.tv courses

- RPG Core Combat Creator   * complete *
- RPG Inventory Systems   * complete *
- Unity Dialogue & Quests   * complete *
- RPG Shops and Abilities   * in progress *

Version 1.0.0 - Added Main Menu - not fully functional yet

This is still a work in progress as the final section needs to be completed, which includes: Shops, Abilities, Traits, Menus and a final wrap up of all features into a playable game.

I will be progressing through the final section of this course material asap and then will add some of my own ideas to it.
